verses.verse: When the prophets, <S%H5029><s%> Haggai <S%H9119><s%> the prophet <S%H5029><s%> and Zechariah <S%H9104><s%> the son <S%H1247><s%> of Iddo, <S%H5714><s%> prophesied <S%H5029><s%> to the Jews <S%H3062><s%> who <S%H1768><s%> were in Judah <S%H3061><s%> and Jerusalem, <S%H3390><s%> in the name <S%H8036><s%> of the God <S%H426><s%> of Israel, <S%H3479><s%> who was over <S%H5922><s%> them,

then <S%H116><s%> Zerubbabel <S%H2217><s%> the son <S%H1247><s%> of Shealtiel <S%H7598><s%> and Jeshua <S%H3443><s%> the son <S%H1247><s%> of Jozadak <S%H9189><s%> arose <S%H6966><s%> and began <S%H8271><s%> to rebuild <S%H1124><s%> the house <S%H1005><s%> of God <S%H426><s%> which <S%H1768><s%> is in Jerusalem; <S%H3390><s%> and the prophets <S%H5029><s%> of God <S%H426><s%> were with them supporting <S%H5583><s%> them.

At that time <S%H2166><s%> Tattenai, <S%H8674><s%> the governor <S%H6347><s%> of [the province] beyond <S%H5675><s%> the River, <S%H5103><s%> and Shethar-bozenai and their colleagues <S%H3675><s%> came <S%H858><s%> to them and spoke <S%H560><s%> to them thus, <S%H3652><s%> "Who <S%H4479><s%> issued <S%H7761><s%> you a decree <S%H2942><s%> to rebuild <S%H1124><s%> this <S%H1836><s%> temple <S%H1005><s%> and to finish <S%H3635><s%> this <S%H1836><s%> structure <S%H846><s%>?"

Then <S%H116><s%> we told <S%H560><s%> them accordingly <S%H3660><s%> what <S%H4479><s%> the names <S%H8036><s%> of the men <S%H1400><s%> were who <S%H1768><s%> were reconstructing <S%H1124><s%> this <S%H1836><s%> building. <S%H1147><s%>

But the eye <S%H5870><s%> of their God <S%H426><s%> was on the elders <S%H7868><s%> of the Jews, <S%H3062><s%> and they did not stop <S%H989><s%> them until <S%H5705><s%> a report <S%H2942><s%> should come <S%H1981><s%> to Darius, <S%H1868><s%> and then <S%H116><s%> a written <S%H5407><s%> reply <S%H5407><s%> be returned <S%H8421><s%> concerning <S%H5922><s%> it.

[This is] the copy <S%H6573><s%> of the letter <S%H104><s%> which <S%H1768><s%> Tattenai, <S%H8674><s%> the governor <S%H6347><s%> of [the province] beyond <S%H5675><s%> the River, <S%H5103><s%> and Shethar-bozenai and his colleagues <S%H3675><s%> the officials, <S%H671><s%> who <S%H1768><s%> were beyond <S%H5675><s%> the River, <S%H5103><s%> sent <S%H7972><s%> to Darius <S%H1868><s%> the king. <S%H4430><s%>
They sent <S%H7972><s%> a report <S%H6600><s%> to him in which it was written <S%H3790><s%> thus: <S%H1836><s%> "To Darius <S%H1868><s%> the king, <S%H4430><s%> all <S%H3606><s%> peace. <S%H8001><s%>

"Let it be known <S%H3046><s%> to the king, <S%H4430><s%> that we have gone <S%H236><s%> to the province <S%H4083><s%> of Judah, <S%H3061><s%> to the house <S%H1005><s%> of the great <S%H7229><s%> God, <S%H426><s%> which <S%H1932><s%> is being built <S%H1124><s%> with huge <S%H1560><s%> stones, <S%H69><s%> and beams <S%H636><s%> are being laid <S%H7761><s%> in the walls; <S%H3797><s%> and this <S%H1791><s%> work <S%H5673><s%> is going <S%H5648><s%> on with great <S%H629><s%> care <S%H629><s%> and is succeeding <S%H6744><s%> in their hands. <S%H3028><s%>

"Then <S%H116><s%> we asked <S%H7593><s%> those <S%H479><s%> elders <S%H7868><s%> and said <S%H560><s%> to them thus, <S%H3660><s%> 'Who <S%H4479><s%> issued <S%H7761><s%> you a decree <S%H2942><s%> to rebuild <S%H1124><s%> this <S%H1836><s%> temple <S%H1005><s%> and to finish <S%H3635><s%> this <S%H1836><s%> structure <S%H846><s%>?'

"We also <S%H638><s%> asked <S%H7593><s%> them their names <S%H8036><s%> so as to inform <S%H3046><s%> you, and that we might write <S%H3790><s%> down <S%H3790><s%> the names <S%H8036><s%> of the men <S%H1400><s%> who <S%H1768><s%> were at their head. <S%H7217><s%>

"And thus <S%H3660><s%> they answered <S%H8421><s%> <S%H6600><s%> us, saying, <S%H560><s%> 'We are the servants <S%H5649><s%> of the God <S%H426><s%> of heaven <S%H8065><s%> and earth <S%H772><s%> and are rebuilding <S%H1124><s%> the temple <S%H1005><s%> that was built <S%H1124><s%> many <S%H7690><s%> years <S%H8140><s%> ago, <S%H6928><s%> which a great <S%H7229><s%> king <S%H4430><s%> of Israel <S%H3479><s%> built <S%H1124><s%> and finished. <S%H3635><s%>

'But because <S%H4481><s%> <S%H1768><s%> our fathers had provoked <S%H2><s%> the God <S%H7265><s%> of heaven <S%H426><s%> to wrath, <S%H8065><s%> He gave <S%H7265><s%> them into the hand <S%H3052><s%> of Nebuchadnezzar <S%H3028><s%> king <S%H5020><s%> of Babylon, <S%H4430><s%> the Chaldean, <S%H895><s%> [who] destroyed <S%H3779><s%> this <S%H5642><s%> temple <S%H1836><s%> and deported <S%H1005><s%> the people <S%H1541><s%> to Babylon. <S%H5972><s%>

'However, <S%H1297><s%> in the first <S%H2298><s%> year <S%H8140><s%> of Cyrus <S%H3567><s%> king <S%H4430><s%> of Babylon, <S%H895><s%> King <S%H4430><s%> Cyrus <S%H3567><s%> issued <S%H7761><s%> a decree <S%H2942><s%> to rebuild <S%H1124><s%> this <S%H1836><s%> house <S%H1005><s%> of God. <S%H426><s%>

'And also <S%H638><s%> the gold <S%H1722><s%> and silver <S%H3702><s%> utensils <S%H3984><s%> of the house <S%H1005><s%> of God <S%H426><s%> which <S%H1768><s%> Nebuchadnezzar <S%H5020><s%> had taken <S%H5312><s%> from the temple <S%H1965><s%> in Jerusalem, <S%H3390><s%> and brought <S%H2987><s%> them to the temple <S%H1965><s%> of Babylon, <S%H895><s%> these <S%H1994><s%> King <S%H4430><s%> Cyrus <S%H3567><s%> took <S%H5312><s%> from the temple <S%H1965><s%> of Babylon, <S%H895><s%> and they were given <S%H3052><s%> to one whose name <S%H8036><s%> was Sheshbazzar, <S%H8340><s%> whom <S%H1768><s%> he had appointed <S%H7761><s%> governor. <S%H6347><s%>

'And he said <S%H560><s%> to him, "Take <S%H5376><s%> these <S%H429><s%> utensils, <S%H3984><s%> go <S%H236><s%> [and] deposit <S%H5182><s%> them in the temple <S%H1965><s%> in Jerusalem, <S%H3390><s%> and let the house <S%H1005><s%> of God <S%H426><s%> be rebuilt <S%H1124><s%> in its place. <S%H870><s%>"

'Then <S%H116><s%> that Sheshbazzar <S%H8340><s%> came <S%H858><s%> [and] laid <S%H3052><s%> the foundations <S%H787><s%> of the house <S%H1005><s%> of God <S%H426><s%> in Jerusalem; <S%H3390><s%> and from then <S%H116><s%> until <S%H5705><s%> now <S%H3705><s%> it has been under <S%H1124><s%> construction, <S%H1124><s%> and it is not [yet] completed. <S%H8000><s%>'

"And now, <S%H3705><s%> if <S%H2006><s%> it pleases <S%H2869><s%> the king <S%H4430><s%> let a search <S%H1240><s%> be conducted <S%H1240><s%> in the king <S%H4430><s%>'s treasure <S%H1596><s%> house, <S%H1005><s%> which <S%H1768><s%> is there <S%H8536><s%> in Babylon, <S%H895><s%> if <S%H2006><s%> it be that a decree <S%H2942><s%> was issued <S%H7761><s%> by King <S%H4430><s%> Cyrus <S%H3567><s%> to rebuild <S%H1124><s%> this <S%H1791><s%> house <S%H1005><s%> of God <S%H426><s%> at Jerusalem; <S%H3390><s%> and let the king send <S%H7972><s%> to us his decision <S%H9568><s%> concerning <S%H5922><s%> this <S%H1836><s%> [matter]."
